translation: Foshuo rāmaṅga jing, vol. 1

source_sentence: 西秦沙門聖堅譯
translation: Translated by the Western Qin ascetic Shengjian

source_sentence: ◎爾時東方有一菩薩，名無異行，寶花承足，步虛而來，詣娑婆世界金剛輪山，
translation: At the time, there was a bodhisattva in the east named Wuweixing. His feet were covered with jeweled flowers, and he came on foot to the vajra-wheel mountains of the sahā world.

source_sentence: 足蹈山時，娑婆世界六種震動，變成眾寶以為莊嚴。
translation: When he stepped on the mountain with his feet, six kinds of earthquakes shook the sahā world and transformed it into a collection of treasures to adorn it.

source_sentence: 舉身毛孔普放光明，皆悉映蔽日月星辰，梵釋四王、及一切天、龍神、夜叉、揵闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，
translation: He raised his body hair pores and emitted a ray of light that shone everywhere, all reflecting the sun, moon, stars, Brahma, Indra, the four kings, all gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and so forth.

source_sentence: 火珠光明、摩尼珠光，皆如聚墨。
translation: The light of the fire-pearl and the light of the maṇi-pearl are all like a heap of ink.

source_sentence: 又此光明，普照地獄、餓鬼、畜生、閻羅王處，及諸幽闇，消滅眾苦，
translation: This ray of light also illumined the realms of hells, hungry ghosts, animals, and kings of hells, as well as all the darknesses of the underworld. It extinguished all kinds of suffering.

source_sentence: 斷除煩惱病苦怖畏，皆得安隱。
translation: They'll be freed from the afflictions, illnesses, pains, and fears, and they'll all attain peace.

source_sentence: 普雨寶雨，充滿佛剎，及雨一切供養之具，以是等種種供養供養如來，
translation: They showered down rain of all kinds of jewels, filling the buddha-lands and showering them with all kinds of offerings.

source_sentence: 隨諸眾生所應見身，為其示現，遍六趣已，到金剛輪山，至觀世音所。
translation: He manifested to sentient beings the bodies they should see. After pervading the six realms of rebirth, he reached the mountain of the diamond wheel and went to the abode of Avalokiteśvara.

source_sentence: 爾時觀世音菩薩，告善財言：「善男子！
translation: It was then that the Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva addressed Sun Cai, Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝見此座無異行菩薩不？」
translation: Do you see this seat as a bodhisattva who doesn't practice differently?

source_sentence: 答言：「大聖！
translation: He replied, Great sage!

source_sentence: 唯然已見。」
translation: Yes, I've seen it.

source_sentence: 時觀世音告善財言：「汝詣彼問，云何菩薩學菩薩行，修菩薩道？」
translation: The Bhagavān then addressed Sun Cai, Go there and ask, How does a bodhisattva train in the bodhisattva practice and cultivate the bodhisattva path?

source_sentence: 時善財童子頭面敬禮觀世音足，遶無數匝，觀察無厭，正念聖教，深入智海，
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the Buddha, bowed his head and face at his feet, and went up into the ocean of knowledge.

source_sentence: 却行辭退，至無異行所，頭面敬禮，右遶七匝，畢已合掌而立，白言：「大聖！
translation: He withdrew, departed, and arrived at a place no different from the one he had approached. After venerating [the Buddha] by bowing his forehead to his feet seven times, he circumambulated him seven times to his right. Having done so, he joined his palms and stood upright.

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何學菩薩行，修菩薩道？」
translation: I've previously aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, but I don't know how an enlightening being is to train in the practice of enlightening beings and cultivate the path of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 答言：「善男子！
translation: He replied, Good man!

source_sentence: 我已成就普現速行法門。」
translation: I've accomplished the method of universally manifesting quickly-acting practice.

source_sentence: 善財童子白言：「大聖！
translation: The boy of good fortune said, Great sage!

source_sentence: 於何佛所，得此法門？
translation: Where did the Buddha obtain this teaching?

source_sentence: 所從來剎，去此幾何，發來久如？」
translation: How long has it been since the buddha from which it came and where it's coming from?

source_sentence: 答言：「善男子！
translation: He replied, Good man!

source_sentence: 此處難知，一切天人及阿脩羅、人非人等，所不能測，唯勤精進不退轉行，
translation: All the gods, humans, titans, humans, and nonhumans cannot fathom this; they only practice with diligence and effort without turning back.

source_sentence: 親近善知識，佛所護念，乃能得知。
translation: Being close to a good teacher and protected by the Buddha, they can then know.

source_sentence: 若非具足宿善根力，清淨直心，具菩薩根，開智慧眼，多聞多知尚不得聞、不能深入賢聖智慧，
translation: If someone doesn't have the power of the past roots of goodness, a pure and straight mind, possesses the bodhisattva faculty, opens the eye of wisdom, is well-versed and well-known, yet they can't hear it or penetrate the wisdom of the noble ones.

source_sentence: 何況信解菩薩行處。」
translation: How could it be the place of faith and understanding the bodhisattva's practice?

source_sentence: 善財童子白言：「大聖！
translation: The boy of good fortune said, Great sage!

source_sentence: 唯願為我，說彼國土如來名號，我當承佛神力及善知識力、信五根力、成就神通力，
translation: “O Mahāprajāpatīṇa, please tell me the name of the Tathāgata who will be born in that buddha-land. I should receive from him the supernatural powers of buddhas, spiritual benefactors, religious practitioners, and enlightening beings, as well as the five kinds of faculties of faith (i.e., good or evil),

source_sentence: 而得信解。」
translation: They'll attain faith and understanding.

source_sentence: 爾時無異行菩薩答善財言：「我所來剎，名妙首法藏，佛號普賢首，於彼佛所，
translation: It was then that the Bodhisattva of Immutable Actions answered Sudhana, saying: “The buddha I came from is called Saddharmapuṇḍarīka.

source_sentence: 得此普現速行法門。
translation: They'll attain this method of universally manifesting quickly-acting dharmas.

source_sentence: 從彼發來，已經不可說佛剎微塵等劫，於一念中，行不可說佛剎微塵等步，
translation: In a moment of thought, they walk as many steps as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 一一步過不可說佛剎微塵等世界，所經諸國，佛皆現在，以一切菩薩無盡供具，
translation: In each and every step they pass as many worlds as atoms in untold buddha-lands, the Buddhas appearing in all the lands where they pass. They provide inexhaustible provisions for all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 供養諸佛摩[少\/兔]摩身。
translation: He makes offerings to the buddhas and rubs [lessly\/rabbit] his body.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 以我得此無著清淨法性生身如實相印三昧法門，以是功德，能供養如來無著法身，
translation: Because of my attainment of this dharma-gate of the unattached pure essence of reality, I am able to produce a buddha-body as it really is. By means of these qualities I can make offerings to the enlightened one’s unattached dharma body.

source_sentence: 以一切諸菩薩所希見事，供養諸佛，隨諸眾生宿世善根，為現色身而為說法，
translation: “Great enlightening beings honor all buddhas by means of the things they wish to see. They show their physical bodies to sentient beings according to their past roots of goodness and teach the Dharma for them.

source_sentence: 放大光明，普照十方，應適眾心，隨其所須，如意皆得，成就法藏，出微妙聲，
translation: He emanated a great ray of light that shone everywhere in the ten directions, adapting to the mentalities of all beings; according to their needs and wishes he obtained them as he wished. Having perfected the treasury of the Teaching, he uttered subtle sounds:

source_sentence: 演說正法，饒益眾生，以妙法身，度脫眾生，乃至十方，亦復如是。
translation: He expounds the true teaching, benefits sentient beings, liberates sentient beings with the wonderful Dharma body, and so on, up to the ten directions, likewise.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩普現速行法門，諸大菩薩，普於十方，無所不至，境界無量，
translation: “I only know this enlightening being’s teaching of universal speedy action. The great enlightening beings go everywhere in the ten directions, reaching everywhere; their spheres are immeasurable.

source_sentence: 無能壞者，清淨法身，充滿法界，分別了知諸眾生道，滿一切剎，順一切法，
translation: The indestructible one is the pure body of reality, filling the cosmos of reality. He discerns and knows the paths of sentient beings, filling all worlds, adapting to all phenomena.

source_sentence: 等觀三世，說平等法，隨順世間，不著佛道，普至無著無礙，善說一切諸法實相本性空寂，
translation: Observing all times equally, they expound the teaching of equanimity. Consistent with the world, they do not cling to the path of buddhahood. They reach everywhere without attachment or obstruction. They skillfully explain that all things are empty and void by their essential nature as true characteristics.

source_sentence: 我當云何能知能說彼功德行？
translation: How will I be able to know and explain their meritorious conduct?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 於此南方，有城名婆羅波提，彼有一天，名曰大天，汝詣彼問，云何菩薩學菩薩行，
translation: “South of here, in the southern direction, there is a city called Vārāputra. There is a celestial god named Mahedivideva. Go ask him how an enlightening being is to learn and carry out the practice of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 修菩薩道？」
translation: cultivate the bodhisattva path?

source_sentence: 時善財童子，頭面禮敬無異行菩薩足，遶無數匝，瞻仰觀察，辭退南行。
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the bodhisattva Sadāparibhūta and withdrew toward the south. The Bodhisattva Sadāparibhūta, having saluted him by bowing his forehead to the Buddha’s feet, left the assembly.

source_sentence: 爾時善財童子，正念思惟菩薩毘羅摩伽無障礙行，一向專求無異行菩薩智慧境界所出光明智慧神通色身境界，
translation: It was then that Sudhana contemplated the unobstructed practice of the enlightening being Vairocana, focusing his attention on the sphere of light, knowledge, mystic powers, form, and body emanating from the realm of knowledge of enlightening being Universally Good.

source_sentence: 一切功德莊嚴境界，勇猛精進，堅固歡喜，出生無量不可思議持行法門，
translation: In the realm of adornment by all virtues, with courageous exertion, steadfast joy and firm, he produced innumerable unfathomable ways of upholding practice.

source_sentence: 遊戲神通，得決定智，深心悅樂，遍體歡喜，具諸功德諸三昧地、陀羅尼地、諸大願地、諸辯才地、具諸力地，
translation: He plays with supernatural powers and attains certain knowledge. His mind is deeply delighted, his whole body rejoicing. Endowed with the qualities of concentration stages, dhāraṇī stages, great vows stages, eloquence stages, and empowerment stages, he becomes endowed with all kinds of virtues.

source_sentence: 漸漸遊行，至彼城門，推問大天今在何所？
translation: He gradually traveled to the city gate and asked where Mahāprajāpaṇḍika was now.

source_sentence: 時有人言：「善男子！
translation: Someone then said, Good man!

source_sentence: 今在城內重閣堂上，成就微妙清淨色身，大眾圍遶，化現說法。」
translation: Now, he's in the heavy pavilion inside the city, accomplishing a subtle and pure form body that surrounds the crowd and transforms it into a teaching.

source_sentence: 爾時善財童子，詣大天所，頭面敬禮，白言：「大聖！
translation: It was then that the boy of good fortune went to the great celestial, bowed his head and face in respect, and said, Great sage!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，而未知菩薩云何學菩薩行，修菩薩道？」
translation: I've previously aroused the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, but I don't know how an enlightening being is to train in the practice of enlightening beings and cultivate the path of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 是時大天，即申四臂，取四海水，安置四掌，不令漏落，自為善財童子，
translation: The great celestial being then extended his four arms, drew the water from the four seas, placed it in his four palms, and did not allow the water to flow down.

source_sentence: 澡面漱口，取金蓮華，以散善財，而作是言：「希有善男子！
translation: He washed his face, rinsed his mouth, took the golden lotus flower, dispersed his good fortune, and said, Rarely, good man!

source_sentence: 甚奇甚特，乃能遠來，求善知識。
translation: They are so rare and special that they can come from afar to seek good friends.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 諸菩薩行，難聞難見，甚深微妙，不可思議，勇猛精進，形容微妙，人中分陀利，
translation: The practices of enlightening beings are difficult to hear and difficult to see; they are profound and subtle, inconceivable, brave and vigorous, subtle and beautifully shaped like human beings.

source_sentence: 為眾生歸依，覆護一切，饒益眾生，攝取不捨，安隱一切，普照一切十方剎海，
translation: He takes refuge in sentient beings, protects them all, benefits sentient beings, embraces and doesn’t abandon them, brings peace to all, illumines all oceans of worlds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 顯現正道，遠離愚癡，為大導師，護持正法，獎引眾生，安隱無患，到於彼岸，
translation: He manifests the right path, is far removed from folly, becomes a great teacher, preserves the right teaching, rewards sentient beings, brings peace and ease to them, and reaches the other shore.

source_sentence: 必定當至一切智城，甚為希有。
translation: He'll surely reach the city of omniscience, which is very rare.

source_sentence: 菩薩三業，具足成就難淨能淨，永離眾惡，於眾生類，常以愛語，隨其所應，
translation: Enlightening beings’ three activities are endowed with accomplishing what is difficult to purify and what can be purified, forever leaving behind all evils. They always speak lovingly to sentient beings according to their needs,

source_sentence: 悉現其前，未甞失機。
translation: They all appeared before him, but they didn't lose their opportunity.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯成就菩薩雲網光明法門。」
translation: I've only accomplished the bodhisattva's dharma-gate of cloud, net, and light.

source_sentence: 善財童子白言：「大聖！
translation: The boy of good fortune said, Great sage!

source_sentence: 此雲網光明法門，境界云何？」
translation: What's the sphere of this cloud-network light dharma-gate?

source_sentence: 爾時大天於善財前，積天金聚，猶如山王，積白銀聚，積琉璃聚，積頗梨聚，
translation: At that time the great gods in front of Sudhana accumulated a heap of heavenly gold, just as if they were mountain kings. They accumulated a heap of white silver, a heap of lapis lazuli, and a heap of crystal.

source_sentence: 積車璩聚，積馬瑙聚，積夜光聚，積水精聚，積金精聚，積開導眾生摩尼聚，
translation: They stored up a heap of chariot parts, a heap of agate, a heap of night light, a heap of water spirits, a heap of gold spirits, and a heap of jewels to enlighten sentient beings.

source_sentence: 積紺髮摩尼聚，積周羅摩尼聚，積水光摩尼聚，積玫瑰聚，積紫玫瑰聚，
translation: He accumulated a heap of blue jewels, a heap of circumscribed radiant jewels, a heap of water-luminous jewels, a heap of roses, and a heap of purple roses.

source_sentence: 積日精珠聚，積彌羅佉寶聚，積雜色寶聚，積毘富羅寶聚，積赤真珠羅網聚，
translation: He accumulated a heap of jewels, a heap of precious pearls, a heap of myriad jewels, a heap of all kinds of jewels, a heap of sapphires of various colors, a heap of vaipulya jewels, a heap of red genuine pearls, and a heap of coral nets.

source_sentence: 積栴檀摩尼聚，及積莊嚴支節一切身分諸瓔珞聚，猶如須彌；
translation: The accumulation of sandalwood jewels and the accumulation of ornamented limbs, as well as the accumulation of jewelry on all their bodies, was like a mountain.

source_sentence: 一切花，一切香，一切塗香，一切末香，一切花鬘，一切天衣，一切寶蓋，
translation: All flowers, all fragrances, all odors, all ointments, all powdered incenses, all flower garlands, all heavenly raiment, and all precious canopies.

source_sentence: 一切幢幡，一切樂器，一切床帳，諸供養具，五欲境界，如是眾寶，積如須彌。
translation: All the banners, streamers, music instruments, seats, offerings, and objects of worship in the realm of the five desires—all these treasures were piled up as high as a mountain.

source_sentence: 又復顯現阿僧祇百千萬億諸童女眾，語善財言：「善男子！
translation: Again, they manifested incalculable hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of girls and said to Sudhana, Good man!

source_sentence: 汝可取此一切眾寶，供養如來，惠施一切，攝取眾生，悉令眾生，修檀波羅蜜，
translation: You should take all these various treasures and offer them to the Tathāgata, bestowing on him all kinds of blessings. Take care of sentient beings so that they will all cultivate the transcendent practice of giving.

source_sentence: 學檀波羅蜜，一切捨故，以此捨心，教授一切，普得修行，令諸眾生，
translation: Because they study the transcendent giving of sandalwood, abandoning all, with this mind of relinquishment they teach all and attain enlightenment so that all sentient beings may be liberated.

source_sentence: 能捨難捨。
translation: He's able to abandon and difficult to abandon.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我以此物，教汝布施，普教一切，亦復如是。
translation: With these things, I teach you to give alms, and so do I teach all of them in the same way.

source_sentence: 悉令眾生，以無貪善根，熏修身心，普使眾生，修佛菩薩行，親近善知識，
translation: All cause sentient beings to cultivate their bodies and minds with roots of goodness free from craving, causing them to cultivate the practices of buddhas and enlightening beings and become intimate with spiritual benefactors.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬，尊重讚歎，出生善根，長養善根，成就具足一切善根，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: They produce roots of goodness, develop roots of goodness, perfect all roots of goodness, and give rise to the mind of unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「復次善男子！
translation: Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 若有眾生貪五欲者，為彼示現不淨境界；
translation: If there are any sentient beings who covet the five desires, I show them an impure realm.

source_sentence: 貪國土者，為說無常；
translation: To those who covet the land they teach impermanence.

source_sentence: 為瞋恚怖畏，憍慢放逸，諍訟結恨如羅剎鬼，殺生無度，飲血噉肉，如是等種種眾生，
translation: Because of anger and fear, pride and heedlessness, disputes and grudges like the rāṣāya ghosts, killing sentient beings without restraint, drinking blood and eating flesh, and so forth, all kinds of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 悉為示現，教彼眾生，修大慈悲，皆令永離瞋恚放逸；
translation: They show them all, teaching sentient beings to cultivate great compassion, enabling them all to be forever freed from anger and heedlessness.

source_sentence: 若懈怠者，為現水火盜賊惡王怨敵等難，化以無常，起諸善根。
translation: If someone is lazy, it's because of the difficulty of manifesting water, fire, thieves, thieves, bad kings, enemies, and so forth that they transform themselves into impermanent and give rise to good roots.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 如是種種惡類眾生，以方便慧，滅除諸惡一切障礙智慧怨敵，成就一切諸波羅蜜。
translation: Thus, these various bad kinds of sentient beings use the wisdom of skillful means to extinguish all the bad hindrances and enemies of wisdom and accomplish all the perfections.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩雲網光明法門，諸大菩薩，滅除煩惱，如忉利天王，滅阿修羅難，
translation: “I only know this enlightening liberation of the principle of cloud-like network of lights. The great enlightening beings have extinguished their afflictions, just as the lord of the gods in Trāyastriṃśa Heaven has extinguished the defilements of the asuras.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩如水，能滅眾生煩惱熾火，諸菩薩如火，能燒眾生煩惱積薪；
translation: Enlightening beings are like water, able to extinguish the blazing fire of afflictions of sentient beings; enlightening beings are like fire, able to burn up the accumulated fuel of afflictions of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩如風，吹散眾生貪愛諸著，壞滅一切染愛癡心；
translation: Enlightening beings are like wind blowing and dispelling the cravings and attachments of sentient beings, destroying all defilements, desires, and delusions.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩如金剛，摧滅一切彼我有愛。
translation: The bodhisattvas are like the adamantine, which destroys all their craving for self.

source_sentence: 諸大菩薩，成就如是諸大功德，我當云何能知能說彼菩薩行？
translation: The great bodhisattvas have accomplished such great merits, so how can I know and tell them about their bodhisattva practice?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此閻浮提南方有國，名摩伽陀，寂滅道場菩提樹下，有神名安住，汝詣彼問，
translation: “South of here in Jambudvfpa there is a country called Magadha, which is situated at the foot of an enlightenment tree on the site of nirvana.

source_sentence: 云何菩薩學菩薩行，修菩薩道？」
translation: How does a bodhisattva train in the bodhisattva practice and cultivate the bodhisattva path?

source_sentence: 時善財童子，頭面敬禮彼大天足，爾乃辭退，趣摩伽陀國詣寂滅道場安住神所。
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the great celestial being, bowed his head and face at his feet, and withdrew. He entered the realm of Mahāprajāpatīya (the kingdom of Magadha).

source_sentence: 爾時十千地神，各作是言：「此童子來能救護一切眾生，即是如來藏，
translation: It was then that the ten thousand earth gods each said, “This youth comes to rescue all sentient beings. This is the treasure house of the enlightened.

source_sentence: 能破眾生無明[穀-禾+卵]膜，常生勝妙法王之家，離垢無障，以無量天繒寶冠，
translation: He was able to break through the ignorance of sentient beings’ membranes, and always born in the house of the supremely sublime king of truth. Free from defilement and without obstruction, he wore a jeweled crown of infinite celestial silhouettering.

source_sentence: 以冠其首，有大智慧寶藏，摧伏外道異學諸論議師，法輪王法，教化眾生。」
translation: With his head crowned, he has a great store of wisdom that destroys non-Buddhist and heretical treatise masters and the teachings of the Dharma wheel king who teach sentient beings.

source_sentence: 爾時安住地天一萬神等，震動大地，雨以香水，掃以香風，一萬地天，
translation: At that time ten thousand earth gods, such as the Trāyastriṃśa gods of Ābhāsvara Heaven, shook the earth and rained fragrant water and swept it away with a fragrant wind.

source_sentence: 異口同音，出微妙聲，遍滿三千大千世界，放大光明，普照三千大千世界。
translation: Their different mouths spoke with one voice, producing subtle sounds pervading the great manifold cosmos; emanating great beams of light illumining the manifold cosmos.

source_sentence: 復有眾寶宮殿，以為莊嚴；
translation: There was also a palace of myriad jewels, adorned with all kinds of ornaments.

source_sentence: 一切花樹，開敷鮮茂，曲枝垂下；
translation: All the flowery trees grew luxuriantly and flourished in full bloom, their branches hanging down.

source_sentence: 一切果樹，悉成果實，亦皆垂下；
translation: All the fruit-bearing trees were all bearing fruit, and they hung down as well.

source_sentence: 一切香水，泉源河池，迴淵旋流，更相灌注，演出種種娛樂音聲；
translation: All the fragrant waters, fountains, rivers, and streams flowing back and forth in all directions to each other, producing various sounds of amusement.

source_sentence: 諸天眾寶莊嚴樓閣，騏驎、師子、香象、白鹿、鳳凰、孔雀、異類禽獸，
translation: The gods adorned the towers with various jewels, such as tortoises, lions, fragrant elephants, white deer, phoenixes, and other kinds of birds and animals.

source_sentence: 各與眷屬，齎持供具，皆悉歡喜，出哀和音；
translation: Each of them, together with their retinues, carried the offerings. They all rejoiced and uttered a voice of sympathy and harmony.

source_sentence: 無量寶藏，自然涌出；
translation: Measureless stores of jewels naturally flowed forth.

source_sentence: 四方風起，猶如金輪，吹眾雜花，散道場地，天、龍、夜叉、揵闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、人非人等，
translation: The wind rises in all directions like a golden wheel, blowing various kinds of flowers and spreading them on the terrace of enlightenment. Gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, etc.

source_sentence: 充滿林間。
translation: It fills the forest.

source_sentence: 爾時安住地神告善財言：「善來善男子！
translation: It was then that the earth god Anzhai addressed Shanzai, saying, Well come, good man!

source_sentence: 汝欲自見往昔曾於此處所種善根福報果不？」
translation: Do you want to see for yourself the merits and rewards of the good roots you planted here in the past?

source_sentence: 是時善財童子，頭面敬禮安住天足，遶無數匝，却住一面，白言：「大聖！
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects and said, “O Great Sage!

source_sentence: 唯然欲見。」
translation: Yes, I want to see it.

source_sentence: 爾時安住地神，即以足指案此大地，無量阿僧祇那由他摩尼寶藏，開發顯現，
translation: At that time the earth goddess Anāthapiṇḍika, touching the earth with her feet, revealed to me a store of innumerable thousands of myriads of koṭis of jewels.

source_sentence: 眾吉祥瓶，自然涌出。
translation: All the auspicious vases spontaneously sprang forth.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝昔布施果報，致此寶藏，恣隨汝意，以用布施。
translation: In the past, you gave this treasure treasure treasure treasure-store as a reward for your generosity, and it's freely given according to your wishes.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我已成就菩薩不可壞智慧藏法門，我從然燈佛來，獲大善根，常住此地，
translation: “Furthermore, reverend Śāriputra, I have already perfected the practice of enlightening beings’ indestructible treasury of knowledge and wisdom. Having come from the buddha Rājagṛha, having attained great roots of goodness, I dwell here constantly.

source_sentence: 次第護諸菩薩，令得深入智慧境界，盡其源底，大願成滿，淨菩薩行，
translation: They gradually protect all enlightening beings, enabling them to enter deeply into the sphere of knowledge and wisdom. Extinguishing its source, their great vows are fulfilled, purifying enlightening practice.

source_sentence: 出生一切三昧，修一切神通，具足一切菩薩大方廣功德力，具足諸菩薩大威德力，
translation: They produce all concentrations, cultivate all mystic powers, and are endowed with the great width and extensive virtues of all enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 成就菩薩不可測智慧，其心堅固不可破壞，放光明網遊諸佛剎，聞諸如來受記法輪，
translation: Accomplishing enlightening beings’ unfathomable knowledge and wisdom, their minds firm and indestructible, they emanate webs of light traveling to all buddha-lands, hearing the Teaching from the Buddhas.

source_sentence: 一切如來所轉法輪，一切脩多羅雲，以大法光明普化眾生，受持諸佛自在神力，
translation: All the buddhas’ wheels of teaching turned by all enlightened ones, and all the clouds of celestial spirits emanating great rays of light illumined sentient beings with the light of the Teaching, retaining the unimpeded spiritual power of the Buddhas.

source_sentence: 守護諸佛大法明力，示教利喜，我唯知此菩薩不可破壞智慧法門。
translation: I only know this enlightening being’s teaching of unbreakable knowledge and wisdom.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 乃往古世過須彌山微塵數劫，有劫名光明淨，世界名月幢，如來號善眼。
translation: In the distant past, as many eons ago as there are grains of dust in the polar mountain, there was an eon named Pure Light and a world named Moon Banner, where the Tathāgata was called Good Eye.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我於光明淨劫善眼佛所，思惟得此法門，修習長養淨此法門，增進高廣普演法門，
translation: “At the buddha Sunetra of the Pure Eon of Light I contemplated attaining this teaching, cultivating and purifying this teaching, enhancing it, increasing its depth and breadth.

source_sentence: 於其中間，常得見佛，從光明劫乃至賢劫，於其中間過不可說不可說佛剎微塵等劫，
translation: In between them they always saw buddhas, from the eon of light up to the eon of goodness; in between them passed as many eons as atoms in untold buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 劫中諸佛，我悉親近，具足供養如是諸佛，往詣道場菩提樹下，諸莊嚴具，
translation: To all the buddhas of past, present, and future ages I will become intimate with them. Fully honoring such buddhas, I go to their sites of enlightenment under the tree of enlightenment, adorned with various ornaments.

source_sentence: 我悉得見，於一一佛所聽受修習，得此法門，於諸佛所，修習善根，以此善根，
translation: I see them all, listen to the teachings of each buddha and practice them. Attaining this way of enlightenment, I cultivate my roots of goodness in the presence of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 聞法因緣，得不可壞藏智慧法門。
translation: Because of the causes and conditions of hearing the Dharma, they attain the Dharma teaching of the indestructible store of wisdom.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩不可壞藏智慧法門。
translation: I only know this bodhisattva's incorruptible store of wisdom and the Dharma teaching.

source_sentence: 諸大菩薩，於一切佛所，親近供養，諸佛說法悉聞受持，隨佛音聲，為他演說，
translation: “Great enlightening beings attend all buddhas and make offerings to them. All the teachings of those buddhas they hear, retain, and teach for others in accord with the voice of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 念念相續，得入佛心，住佛祕密，得淨法身，超出菩薩無明習[穀-禾+卵]，
translation: Continuing in each successive thought, they attain entry into the Buddha’s mind. Abiding in the secrecy of buddhahood, they attain the pure body of reality and go beyond the bodhisattvas’ ignorance and accumulation [grassuckle-grass+eggs].

source_sentence: 出生一切諸佛影藏，善說句義，憶持不忘，普現諸色身，於身不二相。
translation: It produces the reflection treasury of all buddhas, explaining words and meanings well, retaining and not forgetting them; it manifests physical bodies everywhere, having no dual characteristics in body.

source_sentence: 諸菩薩行，無量無邊，我當云何能知能說？
translation: The practices of enlightening beings are immeasurable and limitless, so how can I know or tell them?

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 此閻浮提，有國名無惱，城名勝忍，於彼城中，有一夜天，名婆娑婆陀，
translation: In this Jambudvfpa there is a country called Anāthaka. The name of that city is Vātsīputrīya; in that city there is a night goddess named Vasabhadra,

source_sentence: 汝詣彼問，云何菩薩學菩薩行，修菩薩道？」
translation: Go ask them how a bodhisattva trains in the bodhisattva practice and cultivates the bodhisattva path.

source_sentence: 時善財童子，頭面敬禮安住神足，遶無數匝，眷仰辭退，漸漸遊行，詣夜天所。
translation: Then Sudhana paid his respects to the night goddess Maitrayaniputra, bowed his head and face in reverence, and withdrew.

source_sentence: ◎◎爾時善財童子，正念思惟彼地天教菩薩不可壞智慧法門，修菩薩三昧明，
translation: It was then that Sudhana correctly contemplated the teachings of the bodhisattvas in heaven and cultivated the concentration of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 趣入隨意，觀察菩薩律儀法式，其心明了諸菩薩自在遊戲神通，觀察一切清淨法性，
translation: They entered everywhere as they wished, observing the code of rules and regulations for enlightening beings. Their minds clearly perceived the free play of spiritual powers of enlightening beings, examining all pure dharmas.

source_sentence: 深入菩薩甚深智慧究竟境界，深入菩薩智海法門，隨順菩薩觀察無壞智海法門，
translation: He entered deeply into the ultimate sphere of enlightening beings’ profound knowledge and wisdom. He entered deeply into the principle-gate of the ocean of knowledge of enlightening beings, and followed the principle-gate of the ocean of indestructible knowledge which he observed.

source_sentence: 觀察菩薩深極無邊清淨不壞法門，觀察菩薩法雲法海廕覆法門，漸漸遊行，
translation: He observed the profound, boundless, pure, and indestructible teaching of enlightening beings; he observed the doctrine that covered the ocean of clouds of all truths of enlightening beings, gradually wandering about.

source_sentence: 至彼大城遶無數匝，從東門入，中城而住。
translation: He went to that great city and circumambulated it countless times. Entering through the eastern gate, he stayed in the middle of the city.

source_sentence: 爾時善財，日沒未久，思慕大師，如渴欲飲，隨順一切諸菩薩教，一心合掌，
translation: Soon after the sun had gone down, Sudhana paid his respects to the great teacher Mahaprabha and thought of him as if he were thirsty for a drink. Following the instructions of all the bodhisattvas, he joined his palms in unison.

source_sentence: 欲見大師婆娑婆陀夜天，於善知識所，起於如來、應供、正遍知想，普眼境界，
translation: They wished to see the great teacher Vasabhadradeva, in the presence of spiritual benefactors, give rise to perceptions of Buddha, Worthy of Offerings, and Perfectly Enlightened: this was the sphere of universal vision.

source_sentence: 顯現十方一切色身及智慧力，遍至一切，樂見善知識住淨境界，普見一切諸善知識慈心境界妙藏法門，
translation: He manifested all forms, bodies, and powers of knowledge in the ten directions, pervading them all. Delighted to see spiritual benefactors living in the pure realm, he saw the mysterious treasury door of enlightenment of the sphere of the compassionate minds of all spiritual benefactors.

source_sentence: 得一切法正智慧眼，觀察十方三昧智海普眼境界，不出不入同一如性一切光明法界智海，
translation: Attaining the eye of correct knowledge of all truths, he observed the sphere of the universal eye of the ocean of knowledge of samādhi in the ten directions, not leaving or entering the ocean of knowledge of the reality realm of all lights of one and the same suchness.

source_sentence: 大智慧眼深廣無邊。
translation: The depth and breadth of the eye of great wisdom are limitless.

source_sentence: 見彼夜天，於其城上虛空中住，處寶樓閣香蓮華藏莊嚴世界，坐寶蓮華，
translation: He saw that night goddess standing in the sky above the city, seated in a world adorned with jeweled lotus blossom treasury and fragrant lotus blossom treasury, sitting on a golden lotus flower.

source_sentence: 身真金色，頂髻蠡文，妙金精色，目睫紺青，分齊分明，色相端嚴，殊妙第一，
translation: His body was truly golden in color, his hair stood on its topknot with the embellishment of a dragon’s hair. His complexion was exquisitely golden and his eyelashes were deep blue; their distinctive features were shining brilliantly. Their colors and characteristics were graceful and most beautiful.

source_sentence: 眾寶嚴身，希有無比，見者歡喜，視之無厭身，服朱衣妙寶嚴飾，頂上髻髮，
translation: His body adorned with all kinds of jewels is rare and incomparable. All who see it are delighted to see him, and they don’t tire of looking at his body. He wears a red robe decorated with exquisite jewels and has a topknot on his head.

source_sentence: 猶如梵王。
translation: It's like the king of Brahmā.

source_sentence: 爾時夜天即為善財童子，說蠡髻梵王頂法身印陀羅尼，即說呪曰：「勒躭　婆羅婆娑那　陀羅尼　眤遮梵摩闍咤震那　舍利囉　摩鳩吒　陀羅尼　眤遮　斫迦羅陀羅尼哆莎呵蛇莎呵「善男子！
translation: It was then that the night goddess spoke the dhāraṇī of the seal of the Dharma body at the top of the Brahmā king's head for the sake of the boy of good fortune, and he said, Lekha, Vārāṇasī, Śāriputra, Sāriputra, Mahākauṣṭa, Dhāraṇī, Kāśyapa, Nāgâr

source_sentence: 若有得此陀羅尼者，於其身上諸毛孔中，普現一切日月五星二十八宿，
translation: If there is anyone who has attained this dhāraṇī, all the suns, moons, stars, and twenty-eight constellations will appear in their pores.

source_sentence: 亦現一切辰曜光明，以此光明，普照無量世界一切眾生，於剎那頃，能見眾生在三惡道受八難苦，
translation: He also manifested the light of all celestial constellations, and by this light illumined all sentient beings in infinite worlds. In an instant he was able to see sentient beings in the three evil states of misery and suffering in the eight difficulties.

source_sentence: 於一毛孔，皆悉覩見。
translation: In a single pore, they all saw it.

source_sentence: 所化眾生，或見眾生樂生天者，或有樂得聲聞乘者，或有樂得緣覺乘者，
translation: The sentient beings they teach may see sentient beings happy to be born in heaven, or some will happily attain the vehicle of the śrāvakas, or some will happily attain the vehicle of the pratyekabuddhas.

source_sentence: 或有樂得一切種智者，於一毛孔，皆悉顯現。
translation: Some people who delight in attaining all kinds of cognition will all be revealed in a single pore.

source_sentence: 或有樂見種種方便形色威儀音聲說法及諸語言，亦於一念，皆悉覩見。
translation: Or they may delight in seeing various kinds of skillful means, form, mannerisms, sounds, explanations of doctrine, and speech. In a single thought they also see them all clearly.

source_sentence: 如是微妙，法音清徹，隨所樂聞，經無數劫，亦於毛孔，皆悉見聞及諸菩薩一切行等，
translation: The sound of the Teaching was so subtle and profound as to be able to penetrate all beings’ hair pores. For countless eons they could see and hear it, along with all the practices of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 或見菩薩勇猛精進修諸三昧神通力門，菩薩自在神力境界、菩薩所住、菩薩光明、菩薩神通奮迅法門，
translation: Or they may see the door of enlightening beings’ mystic power of heroic effort in cultivating concentrations, the sphere of enlightening beings’ free spiritual power, the abode of enlightening beings, the light of enlightening beings, the method of enlightening beings’ miraculous projection of knowledge.

source_sentence: 如是種種，隨所化眾生，皆於毛孔，悉得見聞，皆是菩薩本行所得。」
translation: Such kinds of things are all seen and heard in the pores of whatever sentient beings they teach, which are all obtained by the bodhisattva's original practice.

source_sentence: 爾時善財童子見聞是已，心大歡喜，頭面敬禮彼夜天足，遶無數匝，恭敬合掌，
translation: Having seen and heard these words, Sudhana paid his respects to the night goddess Maitrayaniputra. Hearing them, Sudhana was greatly delighted:

source_sentence: 於一面立，白言：「天神！
translation: He stood to one side and said, Goddess!

source_sentence: 我已先發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，心生信解，因善知識，得見諸佛，聞法功德，
translation: Having set my mind on unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, I am convinced. As a result of spiritual benefactors I see all buddhas and hear the virtues of their teachings.

source_sentence: 唯願天神，今當為我開示顯現諸菩薩所行薩婆若道，若有菩薩，向此道者，
translation: May you, goddess, show me the path of omniscience which is practiced by enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 當得菩薩十地十力。」
translation: You'll attain the ten powers of the bodhisattva's ten stages.

source_sentence: 爾時夜天告善財言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: It was then that the night god told Shanzai, Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝能敬善知識，隨順其教。
translation: You should revere spiritual benefactors and follow their instructions.

source_sentence: 若有菩薩，敬善知識，隨順其教，疾疾當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: If there are bodhisattvas who revere good teachers and follow their teachings, they'll quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 唯我成就菩薩光明普照諸法壞散眾生愚癡破魔法門。
translation: Only I've accomplished the bodhisattva's light that universally illuminates all dharmas and destroys the folly of sentient beings who break through the magic gate.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我於邪見惡眾生中發大慈心，於不善業逆眾生中發大悲心，於修善眾生發歡喜心，
translation: “Furthermore, reverend Śāriputra, I develop great compassion toward wrong-headed and evil sentient beings. I develop great compassion toward unwholesome living beings. I develop great compassion toward those who act contrary to the Dharma. I also develop great joy toward those who practice wholesomeness.

source_sentence: 於善惡等眾生起無二心，於染污眾生發清淨心，於邪見著我眾生起平等心，
translation: They develop nondual minds toward sentient beings like good and evil, pure minds toward defiled sentient beings, and impartial minds toward sentient beings attached to self with wrong views.

source_sentence: 於下賤不淨眾生發歡喜心，於著樂眾生生清淨心，於樂生死輪轉眾生發善隨順解生死輪，
translation: They become joyful to those who are lowly and impure, pure to those who are attached to pleasures, and happy to the transmigration of birth-and-death; they become well disposed to the transmigration of birth-and-death by liberation.

source_sentence: 於樂聲聞緣覺眾生發起安立住一切智菩提道心。
translation: He gives rise to the mind that abides in the path of omniscience and enlightenment for sentient beings who are delighted with śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我常如是思惟、教化一切眾生，成就菩薩光明普照壞散眾生愚癡破魔法門。
translation: I always thus contemplate and teach all sentient beings, perfecting the enlightening being's light that universally illuminates and dispels the folly of sentient beings and breaks through the magical door of ignorance.

source_sentence: 於夜後分人靖無聲時，一切鬼神交橫馳走時，盜賊遊行時，比丘離威儀時，
translation: At the end of the night, when the people were calm and there was no sound, all the ghosts and spirits fled in unison, when thieves and robbers wandered about, and when monks were free from their manner.

source_sentence: 煙雲塵霧昏蔽日月不見色時，我於彼處，為作明眼，引導令過。
translation: When smoke, clouds, dust, and mist obscure the sun and moon and don't see form, I create a bright eye in that place to guide and cause them to pass.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，在於城邑村營聚落，山巖曠野，八方大海中，乃至一切水陸叢林，
translation: Suppose there are sentient beings who live in cities, towns, villages, monasteries, mountains, caves, wilderness, oceans of the eight directions, and all the water, land, jungles, and forests.

source_sentence: 嶮路迷道怖畏，雲雷霹靂難，愚人恐怖禽獸難，曠野盜賊難，國土飢饉疾疫難，
translation: The steep paths are feared by those who have lost their way; the clouds, thunder, and lightning disturb them. Foolish people fear birds and beasts; in the wilderness thieves and robbers are afraid of thieves. The land suffers from hunger, famine, disease, and epidemics.

source_sentence: 鬪戰破壞難，以陀羅尼力，滅其恐怖。
translation: Their fears of fighting and disruption are extinguished by the power of the dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，遭於海難黑風揚波，大浪迴覆，商人迷惑，不見邊涯，如是種種水陸諸難，
translation: Suppose there is a living being who encounters an obstacle in the ocean. A black wind blows and waves roll back and forth with great gusts of wind, and the merchants are confused but do not see the limits. Such are the various kinds of difficulties on water and on land.

source_sentence: 我於彼處，為作歸依，或作洲渚，或作船形，濟諸溺人，或作薩薄，或作鮫人，
translation: In that place I may become a refuge, or an island, or a ship, or to rescue those who are drowning, or as a salvation, or as a sea creature.

source_sentence: 或作象王形馬王形，或作小象形黿鼉鼈形，阿脩羅王形，海神龍王形，
translation: They may be shaped like elephant kings, horse kings, small elephants, garuḍas, titan kings, or sea spirits and dragon kings.

source_sentence: 或作狗王蚊虻形，現如是等種種類形，為作歸趣，方便度脫一切苦難，
translation: Or they may take the forms of dog kings, gnats, and gadflies, or show these kinds of various forms as refuges, skillfully liberating them from all suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 願諸眾生，離五陰苦，得解脫道。
translation: May all sentient beings be freed from the suffering of the five aggregates and attain the path of liberation.

source_sentence: 一切人間，於夜闇時，瓦礫荊棘，丘陵堆阜，毒蛇師子，虎狼虺蝮，一切毒害，
translation: All the inhabitants of this land suffer from all kinds of poisons, such as debris, thorns, hills, mounds, poisonous snakes, lions, tigers, wolves, gnats, and vipers.

source_sentence: 寒熱風難，我於爾時，作日月形，明星形，流星形，彗星形，或作雷電霹靂之聲，
translation: At that time I take the form of the sun, moon, stars, meteors, or thunder and lightning.

source_sentence: 或作寶光明形，或作熒惑太白諸災異星變怪之形，或作諸天宮殿，或作天王形，
translation: They may be shaped like jewel lights, or like the emergence of blazing white clouds, or like miraculous manifestations of disasters and strange stars, or like celestial palaces, or like heavenly kings.

source_sentence: 或作諸天龍神八部之形，或作轉輪王形，諸小王形，種種人形，或作菩薩形，
translation: They may take the forms of gods, dragons, spirits, and the eight kinds of deities; they may take the forms of wheel-turning kings, minor kings, various human beings, or bodhisattvas.

source_sentence: 或作如來形，以陀羅尼力種種方便，覆護眾生，願諸眾生，常得安隱，
translation: Or they may take the form of Buddha, protecting sentient beings by various means using the power of dhāraṇī spells, wishing that all sentient beings always attain peace.

source_sentence: 大悲覆護，住佛所住。
translation: Great compassion covers and protects them, abiding in the Buddha's abode.

source_sentence: 或作山巖石窟形，或作溪澗泉池林木藥草花果樹形，或作百種甘饍香美飲食，
translation: They may be shaped like mountains, cliffs, caves, streams, fountains, ponds, forests, trees, herbs, flowers, and fruit-bearing trees, or they may be shaped like hundreds of kinds of delicious food and drink.

source_sentence: 或作氷雪，或作影響蔭涼之形，或作平地道路巷陌，或作迦陵頻伽孔雀王等眾鳥之形，
translation: Or they may be shaped like ice and snow, or shaped like influences of shade and coolness, or shaped like roads and lanes on a level ground, or shaped like the colors of birds such as the kalaviṅka and the great phoenix.

source_sentence: 或作藥樹王放光明形，或作山神地神形，或作炬燭電光之形。
translation: It might be shaped like the king of healing trees or the emanation of light, a mountain spirit or earth spirit, or a torch or candle or flash of lightning.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，在山嶮平澤諸怖畏處，以陀羅尼力，為作救護。
translation: If there are sentient beings who live in the fearless places of mountains, peaks, and plains, use the power of dhāraṇī to rescue them.

source_sentence: 我以如是種種方便，令諸眾生，得免憂苦離生死海，發如是念，令諸眾生，
translation: Through various means such as these I cause sentient beings to be freed from the ocean of suffering and sorrow, beyond the sea of birth and death.

source_sentence: 越我慢山。
translation: It's beyond the mountain of self-conceit.

source_sentence: 又願眾生，超生死流，慧炬炎熾，破無明闇，燒五陰村，度死生澤。
translation: May all sentient beings transcend the stream of birth and death. The torch of wisdom, blazing with enthusiasm, destroys the darkness of ignorance, burns the villages of the five aggregates, and crosses the swamp of birth and death.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我於生死嶮難愚癡眾生，以陀羅尼力，決生死網恐怖繫縛，惡罵呪咀，
translation: Because of the power of my dhāraṇī, I've been freed from the fearful bondage of the web of birth-and-death and reprimanded with a harsh spell.

source_sentence: 兩舌惡口，誹謗讒搆。
translation: They speak harshly with two tongues, slanderous words, and flattering words.

source_sentence: 我於爾時，作迦陵頻伽鳥微妙之聲，說陀羅尼，令彼悅樂，解脫憂苦，
translation: At that time I uttered the subtle voice of a kalaviṅka bird and taught them a dhāraṇī to enable them to be delighted and liberated from sorrow and suffering.

source_sentence: 若嬰兒童子，壯年耆老，聾盲瘖瘂，癃殘拘躄，疥癩癰疽，乃至四百四病，
translation: Suppose an infant or a young child grows old and becomes deaf, blind, dumb, crippled, fettered, covered with abscesses, scabies, leprosy, abscesses, abscesses, blisters, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses, abscesses,

source_sentence: 以陀羅尼力，作大醫王，現病人前為說種種諸治病法，各得除愈。
translation: By the power of the dhāraṇī, he becomes a great king of doctors who appear before the sick man to explain various ways to treat illnesses and each gets rid of them.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我復作是念，見諸眾生。
translation: Again, I think, ‘I see sentient beings.

source_sentence: 樂著五欲棘刺林者，樂著邪見顛倒說者，樂著國土生憍慢者，如是種種愛著苦難，
translation: Those who are attached to the five desires, those who are attached to the thorny forest of passions, those who are attached to wrong views and mistaken explanations, those who are attached to lands and become conceited, these kinds of various attachments cause suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 逼切其身不覺不知，隨彼眾生在在處處，念何事思何事，以陀羅尼力，
translation: They oppress their bodies without perception or non-perception, and according to the places where those sentient beings are, what they think and what they think, by the power of dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 即為現身，示導正路，令得安樂，蒙我恩力，離眾苦難，得安隱處。
translation: That is, in order to show my body and guide me on the right path, enabling me to attain peace and comfort. Through my power of benevolence I will be freed from all hardships and difficulties and find a place of peace and ease.

source_sentence: 我為彼人，復發誓願，令諸眾生遠離三塗，永得解脫一切眾苦，專求智慧，
translation: For their sake I make another vow, to cause all sentient beings to be far removed from the three evil destinies and attain liberation from all suffering forever, singlemindedly seeking wisdom.

source_sentence: 向菩提道，無眾憂患，常得安隱，離五陰縛。
translation: Heading toward the path of enlightenment, they have no many sorrows and always attain peace, free of the five binding aggregates.

source_sentence: 若有邊方諸小國土，國王王子善男子善女人，憂國土諍訟事，憂生業田宅事，
translation: If there are kings, princes, good men, and good women of small countries in the peripheral directions who grieve over disputes in their lands, or grieve over occupations, fields, homes, and affairs of living beings.

source_sentence: 憂名稱榮位自在事，如是種種危厄怖難，我於彼處，以陀羅尼方便之力，
translation: Because of the various dangers and difficulties, such as grief, fame, prosperity, and sovereignty, I used the power of skillful means like a dhāraṇī to conquer those in that place.

source_sentence: 令彼和同，皆得安隱。
translation: I will cause them to be harmonious and at ease.

source_sentence: 復發是願，令諸眾生，除五陰、十二入、十八界等一切諸著，越生死河，
translation: “Furthermore, they make this vow to cause all sentient beings to transcend the river of birth and death by getting rid of all their attachments—the five aggregates, the twelve sense-fields, the eighteen realms, etc.

source_sentence: 安住彼岸。
translation: He's settled on the other side.

source_sentence: 又願眾生，住佛一切種智境界，永離見著，出生安樂一切佛行。
translation: Also, may all sentient beings abide in the Buddha’s sphere of omniscience, forever detached from views and attachments, producing peace and happiness in all buddha-practices.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，著聚落業無明繫縛，六十二見，種種見著，受諸苦惱，甚可愍傷，
translation: “Suppose there are sentient beings who are bound by the bond of ignorance that binds them to villages, actions, views, sixty-two views, various views, and attachments, which bring suffering and distress, most pitiable pain.

source_sentence: 我以陀羅尼方便為其說法，令得厭離，以法攝之。
translation: I teach them the Dharma using skillful means like dhāraṇī teachings, causing them to become disillusioned with it and take it in by means of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 復作是念，令諸眾生，安住無上正法道地。
translation: Again, he had this thought, enabling sentient beings to abide in the unsurpassed ground of the path of the right teaching.

source_sentence: 復作是念，願諸眾生，悉皆遠離六入空聚，超出生死究竟境界，安處薩婆若城寂滅樂處。
translation: Again, he thinks, May all sentient beings be freed from the six sense-fields of emptiness, transcend the ultimate realm of birth and death, and live in the tranquil blissful abode of the city of sarvajña.

source_sentence: 「復次善男子！
translation: Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 如迷方人，以東為西，以西為東，以南為北，以北為南，四維上下，亦復如是；
translation: Good man, it is much the same with someone who has lost his way of travel. He takes east for west, west for east, south for north, north for south, and up and down in all four directions.

source_sentence: 一切世間，迷法之人，不知正道，亦復如是。
translation: So it is with all the worlds, where people who are deluded about the Dharma don’t know the right path.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 世有三人，一狂，二癡，三者風病，如此三人，橫興毒害，手執利劍，
translation: There are three kinds of people in the world. The first is mad, the second is deluded, and the third is afflicted by wind and wind. These three [monks] often produce poison and harm, holding sharp swords in their hands.

source_sentence: 欲斫東方反斫西方，欲斫西方反斫東方，欲斫南方反斫北方，欲斫北方反斫南方，
translation: To the east of Kāmadhātu, one counteracts to the west; to the west of Kāmadhātu, one counteracts to the east; to the south of Kāmadhātu, one counteracts to the north; to the north of Kāmadhātu, one counteracts to the south;

source_sentence: 四維上下亦復如是；
translation: The same applies upward and downward in the four intermediate directions.

source_sentence: 謗法之人亦復如是，心顛倒故，於正法中而生邪相，於邪法中生正法想，
translation: So it is with those who denigrate the teaching. Because their minds are mistaken, they give rise to wrong views about the true teaching and wrong conceptions about the false teaching.

source_sentence: 於常法中生無常想，於無常法中生於常想，於樂法中生於苦想，於苦法中生於樂想，
translation: They think of things as impermanent while they are permanent; they think of things as impermanent while they are impermanent; they think of things as painful when they are pleasant; they think of things as pleasant when they are painful.

source_sentence: 於不淨中生於淨想，於無我法中橫生我想，於平地中生嶮岨想，於嶮岨中生平地想，
translation: In the midst of impurity, thoughts of purity arise; in the midst of selflessness and dharmas, thoughts of self arise horizontally; in the midst of peace, thoughts of fear arise; in the midst of confusion, thoughts of peace arise.

source_sentence: 豐樂之世生飢饉想，飢饉之世生豐樂想，民熾盛世生空荒想，空荒之世生熾盛想。
translation: In the world of abundance and happiness, they give rise to thoughts of hunger and thirst, in the world of hunger and thirst, they give rise to thoughts of abundance and happiness, in the world of prosperity, they give rise to thoughts of emptiness and desolacy, and in the world of emptiness and desolacy, they give rise to thoughts of prosper

source_sentence: 如此愚癡失道眾生、迷惑眾生、失性眾生，我以種種方便陀羅尼力，放大光明，
translation: In the same way I illumine sentient beings who are ignorant, lost to the path of enlightenment, confused, and lacking in essence by means of various skillful means.

source_sentence: 於黑闇處，欲出道者，開其門戶，為愚癡者放大光明，開智慧眼，為失道眾生開示正路，
translation: Those who wish to leave the path in a dark place, he opens their doors and doors, emanates great light for the ignorant, opens the eye of wisdom for the wise, and reveals the right path for the sake of sentient beings who have lost the path.

source_sentence: 而引道之。
translation: He then led them to the Way.

source_sentence: 若有眾生，欲度流者，為作橋、船、津、濟、洲渚，令到彼岸，不知方域示以樂土，
translation: If there are sentient beings who want to cross the river, they build bridges, boats, rivers, ferries, islands, and continents for them so that they can reach the other shore. They do not know their direction or location but show them the land of bliss.

source_sentence: 丘墟坑坎化為平地，生柔軟草，或復現作城邑聚落及諸妙色，以施眾生，
translation: The hills, mounds, pits, and ditches are transformed into a level ground, with soft grass growing; or they may also appear as cities, villages, and other marvelous forms to give to sentient beings.

source_sentence: 令得快樂。
translation: It causes them to attain happiness.

source_sentence: 又復現作江河流泉，園林浴池，人民熾盛，安隱豐樂，令諸眾生，慈心相向，
translation: They also appear as rivers, streams, and springs, parks, forests, and bathing ponds, with dense populations living in peace and well-being. They cause sentient beings to turn toward each other with compassion.

source_sentence: 猶如父子兄弟姊妹。
translation: They're like father, son, brothers, sisters, and so forth.

source_sentence: 復發此願，我今已施一切眾生一切安樂智慧光明，令彼眾生永離闇冥，
translation: “Furthermore, by undertaking this vow I now give all sentient beings the light of knowledge and wisdom that brings peace and happiness to all living beings, enabling them to be forever freed from darkness.

source_sentence: 無復癡愛長夜迷昏無明闇蔽，無眼眾生得智慧眼，普令明淨。
translation: There's no more delusion or craving that remains dark for a long time in the darkness of ignorance, and blind sentient beings who lack eyes attain the eye of wisdom to make it clear and pure.

source_sentence: 若有眾生著於我人眾生相者，令離我人眾生等想；
translation: If there are any sentient beings attached to the characteristics of self, person, and sentient beings, I enable them to be freed from conceptions such as self, person, and sentient beings.

source_sentence: 若有眾生無常常想、無我我想、苦有樂想、不淨淨想、非陰陰想、非命命想，
translation: Suppose there are sentient beings who have no ideation of permanence, no ideation of self and selflessness, no ideation of suffering and pleasure, no ideation of impurity and purity, no ideation of aggregate and aggregate, and no ideation of life.

source_sentence: 於非中陰作中陰想，非陰界入作陰界入想，草木非壽命作壽命想，眾生非草木作草木想，
translation: They conceptualize what’s not intermediate existence as intermediate existence, conceptualize what’s not elements of existence as elements of existence, conceptualize what’s not elements of existence as elements of existence, conceptualize grass and trees that are not life as life, conceptualize living beings that are not grass and trees as grass and trees.

source_sentence: 於非因果作因果想，非善行道作善行道想，殺生祠天求常樂想，乃至十惡邪見等業，
translation: They conceptualize causes and effects as causes and effects that are not causes and effects, bad paths of practice as good paths, killing sentient beings and shrines to seek permanence and bliss, up to the ten bad mistaken views and so forth.

source_sentence: 普願眾生，離此諸想。
translation: May all sentient beings be freed from these conceptions.

source_sentence: 不孝父母，不敬沙門及婆羅門，無有反復，不識恩養，遠離正道，行不善業，
translation: They are not filial to their parents, do not respect śramaṇas and brāhmaṇas, do not rely on what they receive in return, do not know kindness and support, are far removed from the right path, and engage in unwholesome behavior.

source_sentence: 具足十六諸惡律儀，誹謗正道，毀壞正論，深著邪見，謗佛法僧，斷正法輪，
translation: They are endowed with the sixteen kinds of unwholesome restraint, reviling the right path, disparaging right doctrine, deeply clinging to wrong views, denigrating the Buddha, Dharma, and Sangha, and cutting off the wheel of the true teaching.

source_sentence: 壞菩薩眾增惡大乘，殺害菩薩，不讚菩薩僧，如是種種諸不善業，雜類眾生，
translation: They disrupt the bodhisattva community, increase bad Mahayana teachings, kill bodhisattvas, and don't praise the bodhisattvas and saṃgha. Such various kinds of unwholesome actions cause all kinds of sentient beings to become like this.

source_sentence: 眾苦逼身，心懷愁惱，失本智心，不知法利，狂惑愚癡，不識正路，於無量劫，
translation: For innumerable kalpas he was tormented by all kinds of pain and distress, his mind grieved and saddened. Losing his original intelligence, he did not know the benefits of the Dharma; being driven by delusion and folly, he did not know the right path.

source_sentence: 常被誹謗，邪見迷惑，不識諸方者，為如是等非法非律，深生慈悲，令得覆護。」
translation: Being constantly denigrated, deluded by wrong views, and not knowing the directions, they are thus unlawful and undisciplined, deeply compassionate, and cause them to be covered and protected.

source_sentence: 爾時夜天婆娑婆陀，即為諸狂亂謗法眾生，說淨調伏除無量阿僧祇劫罪業障陀羅尼，
translation: It was then that the night god Vasabhadra taught the dhāraṇī of purifying and taming the sinful karmic hindrances of measureless incalculably long eons to the wild sentient beings who denigrated the Dharma.

source_sentence: 即說呪曰：「羝(音都奚反)釤(音踈監反)跛囉(音盧可反)蒲陀那夜(音余架反)三摩末祇　他波耶(音余加反)寣　毘摩隷輸檀奈　毘摩羅輸檀禰翅(音尸鼓反)輸檀尼移莎呵摩訶輸檀那摩羝移莎呵「若有眾生誹謗正法，
translation: He then spoke the dhāraṇī, saying, Om (pronounced Tuṣita)  (pronounced Nirgrantha) śarā (pronounced Rocana) puḍāna (pronounced Yuqi) samādhi hepāya (pronounced Yu加) un, Vimalakīrti Śuddhodana, Vimalakīrti Śuddhodana's

source_sentence: 毀菩薩僧，破和合僧，斷絕大乘聖智慧教，增疾修行菩薩行者，無有反復，
translation: They disparage the bodhisattva samgha, break the harmonious samgha, cut off the noble teachings of wisdom and knowledge of the Mahayana, and hasten to cultivate enlightening practice without repetition.

source_sentence: 如此人等，不名丈夫具男子身。
translation: Such people and so forth aren't called men who possess the body of a man.

source_sentence: 不孝父母，殺逆父母，於善知識所，諍訟欺詐，殺害八人及阿羅漢，不仁不義，
translation: They are not filial to their parents, kill and disobedient to their parents, dispute with good friends, deceive others, commit crimes against the eight kinds of murderers and arhats, and be unkind and unjust.

source_sentence: 偷盜佛物、塔物、法物、招提僧物、現前僧物，犯四重禁，十三僧殘，
translation: Stealing from the Buddha's property, a stūpa's property, a dharma's property, a shrine's property, a monk's property, or a property of the saṃgha in the presence of the saṃgha commits one of the four grave offenses and 13 crimes against the saṃgha.

source_sentence: 十不善道，五無間罪，速疾正向趣惡道者，無明闇蔽沒在苦海，我以大智慧光明願力，
translation: Those in the ten unwholesome paths and five kinds of blameworthy sins who quickly and correctly proceed toward bad paths are drowning in the sea of suffering blinded by ignorance.

source_sentence: 為除無明無間重罪闇障癡惑，令彼速發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，即以大乘而自莊嚴，
translation: In order to remove the darkness of ignorance, unremitting blameworthy sins, and the delusion of ignorance, they cause them to quickly give rise to the determination for unexcelled, complete perfect enlightenment, adorning themselves with the great vehicle.

source_sentence: 具普賢行，為說如來法王境界如來十力、四無所畏、十八不共法神通等事，
translation: He was endowed with the practice of universal goodness and explained to them the ten powers, four fearlessnesses, eighteen unique qualities, mystic abilities, and so forth of the Buddha.

source_sentence: 成就一切大智慧地，我今示現如來十力、四無畏等陀羅尼力，安住一切諸佛正道，
translation: Accomplishing all the stages of great knowledge and wisdom, I now manifest the ten powers of buddhahood, as well as the four powers of fearlessness, so that they may live in the right path of all buddhas.

source_sentence: 以此陀羅尼力，能令十方一切諸佛，同一法身。
translation: Because of the power of this dhāraṇī, they can cause all the buddhas in the ten directions to have the same Dharma body.

source_sentence: 「復次善男子！
translation: Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 我今為於長夜病苦苦惱眾生，多病消瘦，疾疫老朽，慳貪貧窮，危厄困悴，
translation: For a long time I have been afflicted by sickness, pain, and suffering for the sake of sentient beings. Among those who suffer from many illnesses they lose their thinness, become ill with epidemics and old age, are stingy and greedy, and live in great danger and distress.

source_sentence: 亡國破家，流離失土，貧窮孤迸，竛竮失勢無救護者，皆由前世無慈悲心，
translation: It is because of the absence of compassion in former existences that they lost their countries and broken up their families, were driven away from their lands, became poor and helpless, and fell into distress.

source_sentence: 惡業果報，繫屬於他，八苦衰惱以為衣服，為如是等無歸依者，以大悲方便而救護之；
translation: The results of evil deeds belong to others, and the eight kinds of suffering and distress are their clothing. For those who do not rely on anything like this they rescue and protect them by means of great compassion.

source_sentence: 諸貧苦者，以陀羅尼力，令其庫藏自然盈溢；
translation: The poor and oppressed were naturally overflowing in their storehouses by the power of mental command.

source_sentence: 若有慳貪，至死不捨，作守財鬼，為如是等，種種貪著，以諸方便而化導之，
translation: If someone has stinginess and greed, doesn't abandon it until death, becomes a wealth guarding ghost, and so forth, various cravings and attachments are cultivated and guided by skillful means.

source_sentence: 令彼眾生，皆得解脫。
translation: I will cause all those sentient beings to attain liberation.

source_sentence: 復發是願，我當為彼諸眾生等，作大救護，施以法藥，服此藥者，能消一切諸煩惱病，
translation: Again, when you make this vow, I will become a great savior for those sentient beings and so forth, providing them with the medicine of the Dharma. Those who take this medicine will be able to eliminate all their afflictions and illnesses.

source_sentence: 離生老死八苦之畏，無明老死十二輪轉，一切眾苦皆得永離，離惡知識，
translation: Being free of the eight fears of birth, old age, and death, they are free of the twelve evolving cycles of ignorance, old age, and death. They attain permanent separation from all forms of suffering and are free of bad companions.

source_sentence: 親近善友，以普勝法攝取一切，令得安止三清淨業，敬信如來真妙法身，
translation: They associate with spiritual benefactors, taking care of all living beings by means of the universally supreme Teaching, enabling them to attain peace and ease through the three pure deeds. They reverently believe in the buddha-body of truth.

source_sentence: 當得永離生老病死，畢竟常住清淨境界。
translation: They'll attain permanent freedom from birth, old age, illness, and death, and ultimately always abide in the pure realm.

source_sentence: 「復次善男子！
translation: Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 我見邪見諸眾生等，及其眷屬作惡律儀，見諸眾生遠離正道趣於邪逕，
translation: I see wrong views of sentient beings and so forth, and their retinues create bad restraint. I see sentient beings who are far removed from the right path and proceed to wrong paths.

source_sentence: 著諸倒見虛妄迷惑，身口意業其行不善、種種放逸依止邪法，於非正覺生正覺想，
translation: They are addicted to mistaken views and false delusions, physical, verbal, and mental actions that are unwholesome, various kinds of carelessness that rely on wrong teachings, and conceptions of right awakening that arise in regard to what’s not right awakening.

source_sentence: 於正覺所生非正覺想，親近惡友受行苦法，投淵赴火自墜高巖，常翹一脚，
translation: They give rise to thoughts of right awakening and not right awakening, associate with bad friends, experience painful things, plunge into the abyss, go into the fire, fall into a high cliff on their own, and always bend one leg.

source_sentence: 五熱炙身，灰土塗污，臥棘刺上，自餓而死，盛冬潛淵，伏藏氷下，受持雞狗牛鹿等戒，
translation: The five hot bodies are scorched, covered with ashes and dirt, lying on top of thorns and thorn roots, starving themselves to death. In the middle of winter they hide under the ice and receive the precepts for keeping them like chickens, dogs, cattle, oxen, and deer.

source_sentence: 如是種種邪見苦行，欲求解脫，我以種種方便，除其邪見，令得安住於正見中，
translation: In order to liberate those who hold various wrong views and ascetic practices, I remove their wrong views by various means so that they can abide in right view.

source_sentence: 令諸人天得最上樂。
translation: It causes humans and gods to attain the highest happiness.

source_sentence: 復發是願，願諸眾生，出離世間，不著邪見，安處無上正真之道，得不退轉，
translation: They also make this vow, wishing that all sentient beings will leave the world and not cling to wrong views; they will find peace on the supreme path of truth and attain nonregression.

source_sentence: 成一切智，究竟滿足普賢菩薩大願之行，向一切智，不離菩薩一切諸地，
translation: Accomplishing omniscience, they ultimately fulfill the great vows of enlightening beings Universally Good. Heading toward omniscience, they do not leave all stages of enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 不懷一切眾生苦性，而得解脫。」
translation: They don't harbor the suffering of all sentient beings and attain liberation.

source_sentence: 爾時夜天婆娑婆陀，欲重宣菩薩光明普照諸法壞散眾生愚癡法門，承佛威神，
translation: It was then that the night god Vasabhadra, wanting to reiterate the enlightening being’s ray of light which shone everywhere and illumined all dharmas, destroyed the ignorant dharma-gate of sentient beings’ delusion and dispersed it, inherited the Buddha’s spiritual power.

source_sentence: 「我所成妙法，　　知時諸門地，
translation: “The wonderful teachings I’ve accomplished are known as the timely approaches and stages,

source_sentence: 照除愚癡闇，　　普觀一切法。
translation: Illuminating and removing the darkness of ignorance, They contemplate all things.

source_sentence: 我法門寂靜，　　久修慈心得，
translation: The approach of self and dharmas is quiescent, the mind cultivates kindness for a long time.

source_sentence: 無量無數劫，　　大悲覆群生，
translation: For immeasurable, countless eons Great compassion covers all sentient beings.

source_sentence: 成就大悲海，　　出生三世佛，
translation: Accomplishing the ocean of great compassion, They produce the buddhas of all times.

source_sentence: 除滅一切苦，　　善財速究竟。
translation: Extinguishing all suffering, Sudhana quickly ended it.

source_sentence: 佛子心歡喜，　　永離世間惡，
translation: The Buddha-child’s mind is joyful, Forever detached from worldly evil.

source_sentence: 超出三界苦，　　受諸賢聖樂，
translation: He transcends the suffering of the three realms and experiences the bliss of the wise and holy.

source_sentence: 遠離有為惡，　　聲聞智解脫，
translation: Being far removed from the evil of conditioned things, śrāvakas are liberated by knowledge.

source_sentence: 滿足諸佛智，　　佛子應究竟。
translation: Fulfilling the buddhas’ knowledge, The offspring of Buddha Should be perfected.

source_sentence: 我以遍淨眼，　　普觀十方剎，
translation: With pervasive pure eyes, I observe all the buddha-lands of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 於彼世界中，　　諸佛坐道場，
translation: In those worlds, The buddhas are seated on the terrace of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 相好莊嚴身，　　無量眾圍遶，
translation: A body adorned with marks and embellishments Surrounded by countless beings.

source_sentence: 放大光明海，　　普化諸群生，
translation: He emanates a great ocean of light, Teaching all sentient beings everywhere.

source_sentence: 覩諸眾生類，　　死此而生彼，
translation: They pity all sentient beings, dying here and being born there.

source_sentence: 迴流六趣中，　　備受諸苦毒。
translation: In the six destinies of rebirth, they'll be subject to suffering and poison.

source_sentence: 我以淨耳海，　　普聞十方音，
translation: Through the ocean of my pure ears I hear all the sounds in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 一切語言海，　　皆悉能受持。
translation: All the oceans of words They can receive and hold.

source_sentence: 我以淨鼻根，　　法海中無礙，
translation: With my pure nose faculty, I am unobstructed in the ocean of truth.

source_sentence: 能入諸法門，　　善財應究竟。
translation: Being able to enter all the teachings, Sun Cai should be perfected.

source_sentence: 我成大人相，　　清淨廣長舌，
translation: I am endowed with the characteristics of greatness, With a pure, broad and long tongue.

source_sentence: 隨應演說法，　　佛子應究竟。
translation: He teaches the Dharma according to what should be taught, and the heirs of the Buddha should perfect it.

source_sentence: 清淨妙法身，　　三世如如等，
translation: The pure and marvelous body of the Teaching Is like this in all times.

source_sentence: 隨其所應化，　　一切無不現。
translation: According to what they should be taught, None of them don’t appear.

source_sentence: 我心無所著，　　澄清如虛空，
translation: The mind of self has no attachment, It’s as clear as space.

source_sentence: 普攝佛境界，　　而亦無二相。
translation: They embrace all the spheres of buddhahood And have no dual characteristics.

source_sentence: 悉知無量剎，　　眾生諸心海，
translation: They know all the infinite lands, The oceans of minds of sentient beings.

source_sentence: 分別諸根意，　　遠離虛妄法。
translation: Discriminating the faculties and minds, they're far removed from false dharmas.

source_sentence: 我以神通力，　　遍遊無量剎，
translation: With my supernatural powers, I traveled to innumerable lands.

source_sentence: 普覆一切眾，　　調伏諸眾生。
translation: They cover all sentient beings and tame sentient beings.

source_sentence: 智慧淨如空，　　無比無盡藏，
translation: Their knowledge and wisdom are pure like space, incomparable, inexhaustible treasury.

source_sentence: 供養一切佛，　　饒益諸眾生。
translation: Making offerings to all buddhas, Benefiting sentient beings.

source_sentence: 廣大淨智慧，　　了知諸法海，
translation: Vast, pure knowledge and wisdom They know the ocean of all truths.

source_sentence: 除滅眾癡惑，　　佛子應究竟。
translation: To extinguish all delusions and afflictions, the Buddha-child should be perfected.

source_sentence: 我入佛法海，　　通達三世法，
translation: I entered the ocean of buddha-dharma and comprehended the teachings of all times.

source_sentence: 明了一切智，　　無能測量者，
translation: Understanding all cognition, There’s no one who can measure it.

source_sentence: 一一微塵中，　　悉見佛剎海，
translation: In each atom They see oceans of buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 或覩三世佛，　　真實智慧力，
translation: Or they may see the buddhas of the past, present, and future, Their true power of knowledge.

source_sentence: 見盧舍那佛，　　道場成正覺，
translation: Seeing Vairocana Buddha At the terrace of enlightenment, They become perfectly enlightened.

source_sentence: 十方微塵剎，　　悉轉正法輪。」
translation: The tiny buddha-lands in the ten directions all turn the right wheel of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 觀察十方，即為善財童子，以偈頌曰：爾時善財童子白天神言：「發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，
translation: He looked in the ten directions and said to Sudhana, “May you give rise to the aspiration for supreme perfect enlightenment!

source_sentence: 為已幾時？
translation: How long has it been?

source_sentence: 得此法門，其已久如，乃能如是饒益眾生？」
translation: It's been a long time since he attained this teaching, so how could he thus benefit sentient beings?

source_sentence: 答言：「佛子！
translation: He replied, Son of the Buddha!

source_sentence: 乃往古世，過須彌山微塵數等劫，復過是數無量無邊，彼有世界，名七寶功德集，
translation: “World-honored One, from ancient times when there were as many eons past as atoms in the polar mountain and beyond that numbering infinitely many eons ago, there was a world called accumulation of the attributes of seven jewels.

source_sentence: 劫名光明寂靜，國名寶月光明，城名蓮花光處，閻浮提中於此劫中，有五百億佛出興于世。
translation: The eon is called Silent Light of Tranquility, the land is called Jewel Moon Light, and the city is called Place of Lotus Light. During this eon five hundred myriads of koṭis of buddhas appear in the world in Jambudvfpa.

source_sentence: 時彼城中，有轉輪聖王，名善法度，以聖王法正法治世，七寶自至，王四天下，
translation: In that city, there was a wheel-turning sage king named Sudarśana, who ruled the world according to the law of the sage king. He possessed all the seven kinds of treasure and reigned over the four quarters of the earth.

source_sentence: 壽命一劫，威力自在，不加兵仗自然太平。
translation: Their life span is one kalpa in length, and they are sovereign and naturally peaceful without the use of weapons.

source_sentence: 彼王所重第一夫人，名日月意，其王夫人伎樂自娛，至於中夜淳昏而眠，
translation: The first queen, whom the king esteemed, was named Candravyūha. The queen of the king amuse herself with music and dancing until midnight when she fell asleep in the middle of the night.

source_sentence: 夢此城中有一夜天，名最正覺寂靜光明，來至其前，合掌而立，而作是言：『咄！
translation: In a dream, there was a night god named Most Perfectly Awakened Tranquil Light in this city who came before him, joined his palms and stood upright, saying, 'Duh!

source_sentence: 善女人，汝今知不？
translation: Good woman, do you now know?

source_sentence: 於蓮花光大城之東，有林名寂靜光微妙德，於此林中有菩提樹，名一切佛自在光，
translation: To the east of the great city Lotus Light was a forest called Silent Light of Sublime Virtue, and in that forest there was an enlightenment tree named Independent Light of All Buddhas.

source_sentence: 有佛世尊，號一切法雷音王，坐此樹下成等正覺，十號具足，放大光明，
translation: There was a buddha world-honored one named King of the Thunder of All Truths, who sat under this tree and became perfectly enlightened. Endowed with the ten supreme names, he emanated great rays of light.

source_sentence: 名摩尼王普照一切。
translation: He's called the maṇi king who universally illuminates all.

source_sentence: 彼雷音王佛，出興於世，於菩提樹下，始成正覺，已經七日！』
translation: That thunderous king Buddha emerged in the world, and it's been seven days since he first became perfectly enlightened under the bodhi tree!'

source_sentence: 時彼夜天，稱揚讚歎，顯說如來無量功德自在神通，令彼夫人發無上道心，
translation: That night goddess then extolled and praised the Tathāgata, revealing his immeasurable miraculous power of unimpeded supernormal abilities that caused her to give rise to the mind of the unsurpassed path.

source_sentence: 讚歎普賢菩薩一切願行。
translation: They praise all the vows and practices of Samantabhadra Bodhisattva.

source_sentence: 時王夫人，即於夢中敬禮彼佛，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心供養佛。
translation: The king's wife then paid homage to that Buddha in a dream, gave rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment, and offered support to him.

source_sentence: 時世尊放金色光觸夫人心，遍照宮城皆同金色。
translation: The Bhagavān then radiated a golden light that touched the lady's heart and shone throughout the palace and city, all of which were the same color.

source_sentence: 時彼夫人，即從眠覺。
translation: The lady then woke up from her sleep.

source_sentence: 爾時彼佛侍從聲聞、菩薩、一切大眾，現夫人前，是時夫人，頭面敬禮佛及大眾，
translation: At the time, that Buddha was attended by śrāvakas, bodhisattvas, and all the other members of the great assembly. He appeared before the queen’s wife. The queen paid homage to the Buddha and the entire assembly with her head and face facing him.

source_sentence: 供養恭敬尊重讚歎，即發誓願：『願此功德，於將來世，天人之中，最尊最勝。』
translation: He makes offerings, respects, venerates, honors, and praises them, then makes a vow, 'May this merit be the most honored and superior among gods and humans in future lives.'

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝今當知，時王夫人月意者，豈異人乎？
translation: You should now know that the king's wife, who was thinking of the moon at the time, wasn't someone else?

source_sentence: 我身是也。
translation: This is the self-body.

source_sentence: 我於彼佛所，初發道心，莊嚴功德，種大善根，超越須彌微塵等劫，不墮地獄、餓鬼、畜生、閻羅王處、下賤之家，
translation: In the presence of that buddha I first set my mind on enlightenment, adorned myself with virtue, and planted roots of goodness. For as many kalpas as there are atoms in the polar mountain I did not fall into the hells, the realms of hungry ghosts, the animal kingdoms, or the states of inferior beings.

source_sentence: 具足諸根滅除眾苦，常於人天中，得最勝果報，常得不離親近善友，常生諸佛菩薩之家，
translation: They are endowed with the faculties to extinguish all sufferings, and always attain the supreme reward among humans and gods. They always attain it without leaving their good companions. They are always born in the house of buddhas and enlightening beings.

source_sentence: 不生五濁劫。
translation: They won't give rise to the five turbid eons.

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我獲善利，於彼佛所，深種善根，長養善根，於八十億須彌山微塵等劫，
translation: In the presence of that buddha I deeply planted roots of goodness and nurturned those roots of goodness for as many kalpas as there are atoms in eighty-eight koṭis of Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 常受快樂，而未滿足菩薩善根，亦未獲得三昧神通，得過八十億須彌山微塵等劫。
translation: They always experience happiness, yet they haven't fulfilled the bodhisattva's good roots, haven't attained samādhi and supernormal abilities, and have attained more than eighty billion eons like the tiny dust of Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 過此劫已，復過一萬劫，有劫名清淨無憂，世界名清淨威德勝，彼世界中，
translation: After this eon, another 10,000 eons will pass. There will be an eon called “purity and freedom from sorrow.” The worlds there will be called “utter purity and supreme majesty.”

source_sentence: 有五百億佛，出興於世，成等正覺，十號具足，彼佛國土或淨或穢。
translation: Five hundred myriad koṭis of buddhas have emerged in the world and become perfectly enlightened. Their ten universal names are complete, and their buddha lands may be pure or defiled.

source_sentence: 我時次第，供養彼佛。
translation: At the time, I was in order to make offerings to that Buddha.

source_sentence: 彼佛世界，有一四天下，名離垢幢，城名莊嚴，我於爾時，為明勝長者女，
translation: In that buddha-world, there were four continents called Undefiled Banner and a city called Array. At that time I was the elder woman Vaiśravaṇa’s wife.

source_sentence: 名勝慧光，端正殊妙。
translation: His name was Supreme Light of Wisdom, and his manner was marvelous.

source_sentence: 於彼世中，值最初佛，名須彌山善寂幢。
translation: In that world, he'll meet the first Buddha named Sumeru Shanji banner on Mount Sumeru.

source_sentence: 時有一天，名淨覺月，以本願力，生彼城中，復有夜天，名清淨眼，於睡眠中，
translation: At that time a celestial being named Moon of Pure Awakening was born in that city by the power of his original vow. There was also a night goddess named Pure Eye, who was sleeping there.

source_sentence: 入於王宮，即至我所，顯現妙身，讚歎如來，勸我發心，令往佛所，作如是言：『須彌山善寂幢佛，
translation: Having entered the king’s palace, he came to me and manifested his marvelous body in praise of the Tathāgata. Encouraged me to give rise to the aspiration for enlightenment, he told me to go before the Buddha and said:

source_sentence: 始成正覺，放大光明，已經七日！』
translation: It's been seven days since he first became perfectly enlightened and radiated his light!'

source_sentence: 爾時夜天，引導於我，我即驚覺，見大光明遍滿宮室。
translation: At the time, the night goddess guided me. I was startled and saw a great ray of light filling my palace.

source_sentence: 父母驚喜，即告我言：『此何光明，金色顯赫，明照吾室？』
translation: Surprised, my parents told me, 'What's this light that shines brilliantly golden and brightly illuminates our room?'

source_sentence: 我於爾時即白父母：『我於夢中，見一夜天，讚歎如來勝妙功德，有佛世尊，
translation: At that time I said to my parents: In a dream, I saw the night gods praising the supreme and marvelous qualities of the Tathāgata.

source_sentence: 名須彌山善寂幢，出現於世，已經七日。
translation: It was called the Sumeru Mountain Banner of Good Tranquility, which had appeared in the world for seven days.

source_sentence: 唯願父母，與諸眷屬，往詣佛所供養恭敬，聽佛說法。』
translation: May my parents and their members of the retinue go to the Buddha's place to offer support and respect, and listen to him teach the Dharma.'

source_sentence: 父母歡喜，即便許可。
translation: The parents rejoiced and gave their permission.

source_sentence: 是時夜天，在前引導，我與父母及親眷屬，俱詣佛所，頭面禮足，退坐一面，
translation: At that time the god of the night was leading me before him. My parents, my relatives, and those who belonged to my clan all approached the Buddha. After honoring him by bowing their foreheads at his feet, they withdrew and sat to one side.

source_sentence: 見佛色身微妙光明，即得菩薩清淨三世普智慧光明三昧。
translation: Seeing the subtle light of the Buddha's form body, he attains the concentration of the bodhisattva's pure samādhi of the light of universal wisdom of the three worlds.

source_sentence: 得此三昧已，憶念過去如須彌山微塵等劫所見諸佛，所說經法，受持不忘，
translation: Having attained this concentration, they remember the teachings of scriptures and doctrines expounded by buddhas of the past, as many eons ago as atoms in the polar mountain. They retain these teachings without forgetting them.

source_sentence: 即得光明普照諸法壞散眾生愚癡破魔法門。
translation: That's when he attains the light that universally illuminates all dharmas and destroys the folly of sentient beings and breaks through the magic gate.

source_sentence: 得此法門已，復憶過去十世界微塵數劫世界時事，又見彼諸一切眾生，
translation: Having attained this teaching, they also remember the events of past eons as numerous as atoms in ten worlds and see all sentient beings there.

source_sentence: 及其業報、好醜、諸根利鈍，性欲不同，語言音聲，久修善業，親近善知識，
translation: Their karmic retributions, good and bad, their faculties sharp and dull, their faculties sharp and dull, their natures and desires different, their speech and sounds different, they cultivate good actions for a long time and become intimate with good friends.

source_sentence: 隨其所應，示現色身，為作利益，見如此事，如今現在。
translation: They manifest physical bodies as they should be, for the sake of benefiting others. Seeing such things now, they are manifested in the present.

source_sentence: 我以此三昧力，於念念中，增長法門，心心相續，能以一身，充滿十方微塵等世界，
translation: Because of the power of this concentration, in each moment of thought I increase the exposition of the Teaching; mentally and mentally sustained, I can fill as many worlds as atoms in the ten directions with a single body.

source_sentence: 乃至充滿一切世界微塵等海，又復過彼一切世界微塵數不可說不可說世界，
translation: It fills as many oceans of worlds as there are atoms in all the buddha-fields, and surpasses all those other continents.

source_sentence: 如是世界中，悉見一切諸佛，聞佛說法，悉能憶念，受持分別，了知彼佛本淨願海，
translation: In all these worlds they see all the Buddhas, hear their teachings, and are able to remember them. They receive, retain, analyze, and know the ocean of pure vows of those Buddhas.

source_sentence: 又知諸佛發清淨願，莊嚴佛土，我今亦欲嚴淨一切世界海眾生，令得淨土，
translation: “Furthermore, you know that the Buddhas have undertaken pure vows to adorn the buddha-lands. I now also want to adorn and purify all sentient beings in all oceans of worlds so that they may attain enlightenment.

source_sentence: 如今現前，隨彼眾生，所應見身，即為示現，調伏其心，而化度之，我從昔來乃至今日，
translation: I now manifest myself in the form that sentient beings should see, to show it to them and tame their minds so that they can be liberated. From the distant past up to the present

source_sentence: 剎那相續，長養增進修此法門，如此法門，究竟廣大，如法界等。
translation: In the succession of moments, this aspect of doctrine is nurtured and develops. This aspect of doctrine in such a way that it is ultimately as vast as the realm of reality.

source_sentence: 「善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 我唯知此菩薩光明普照一切諸法壞散眾生破魔法門。
translation: I only know that the light of this bodhisattva universally illuminates all dharmas, destroys sentient beings, and breaks through the gate of magic.

source_sentence: 諸大菩薩究竟無量無邊普賢菩薩所行願海，深入一切諸法界海，建立一切諸菩薩智慧幢三昧遊戲神通大願成滿守護受持諸佛如來大功德海，
